metadata.description:
131 pages!

The Xeric Award-winning graphic novel is back in print, in a new edition! From Galileo to Isaac Newton to Richard Feynman, you'll be amazed how the personalities of the scientists who shaped our world shaped the lives and discoveries. Some are serious, some are humorous, and each is a compelling tale of science history.
metadata.name: Two-Fisted Science: Stories About Physicists
